metadata.title: CVE-2023-1073 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A memory corruption flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s human interfacedevice (HID) subsystem in how a user inserts a malicious USB device. Thisflaw allows a local user to crash or potentially escalate their privilegeson the system.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-1073` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-241-generic - 4.4.0-241.275
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-241-generic - 4.4.0-241.275
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-241-lowlatency - 4.4.0-241.275
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-209-generic - 4.15.0-209.220~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-209-generic - 4.15.0-209.220~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-209-lowlatency - 4.15.0-209.220~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1120-kvm - 4.4.0-1120.130
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1157-aws - 4.4.0-1157.172
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1154-aws - 4.15.0-1154.167~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1163-azure - 4.15.0-1163.178~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1148-gcp - 4.15.0-1148.164~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1117-oracle - 4.15.0-1117.128~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-241.275').
linux-hwe package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-209.220~16.04.1').
linux-kvm package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1120.130').
linux-aws package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1157.172').
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1154.167~16.04.1').
linux-azure package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1163.178~16.04.1').
linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.4.0-1089.96').
linux-gcp package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1148.164~16.04.1').
linux-gke: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-oracle package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1117.128~16.04.1').
linux-oem: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-raspi2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-snapdragon: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
